description: Bear Grylls and Salman Rushdie take shelter in an inflatable tent while considering doorstep drugs and a rodent romance.
title: A Dual Review of What’s New, Starring Salman Rushdie and Bear Grylls
title_page: A Dual Review of What’s New, Starring Salman Rushdie and Bear Grylls - The New York Times
text:
This may be the definitive version of "Pride and Prejudice." If they could get "War and Peace" down to this length, it would be a service to mankind.
ROMANCE FOR RODENTS A furry abridgement of the Jane Austen classic ($13, bloomsbury.com).
